title: Alex Eala hits new career-high 40th in WTA official ranking
desc: MANILA, Philippines — Alex Eala continues to rise in WTA rankings, posting a new career-high of No. 40 following her solid run in Abu Dhabi Open last week.

title: Promising longevity molecule may help defend against Alzheimer’s disease: Singapore study
desc: SINGAPORE: A local study has shown that a naturally occurring molecule, which is commonly studied for its anti-ageing effects, could improve communication between brain cells and restore key memory-related brain functions impaired by Alzheimer's disease.

title: Cooking up monsters: Inside Malaysia’s indie game 'Midwest 90: Rapid City'
